summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements, including address fixes, homepage redesign, car emoji removal, airports data file, flight/hotel booking upgrades, and premium UI styling. However, several specific acceptance criteria are not fully evidenced in the diff, particularly around CarRentalsPage.tsx changes (REQ-58, REQ-59), comprehensive coverage of all pages in the premium UI refresh (REQ-63), and some REQ-55 address fixes in specific files like TermsPage.tsx and AboutPage.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Move 'Most Popular' badge to the Sedan vehicle card, remove it from SUV, place Sedan first with prominent border/accent treatment in CarRentalsPage.tsx
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to CarRentalsPage.tsx are present in the diff. The file is not listed as a modified file, so there is no evidence of Sedan/SUV badge changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all car-related emojis from CarRentalsPage.tsx and homepage service cards, replace with Lucide React icons
missing_requirements.reason: CarRentalsPage.tsx is not in the modified files list. The homepage service cards in HomePage.tsx use Lucide icons but no evidence of emoji removal from CarRentalsPage.tsx specifically.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix address in TermsPage.tsx and AboutPage.tsx â€” no instance of 'Nagpur' should remain
missing_requirements.reason: TermsPage.tsx and AboutPage.tsx are not listed as modified files in the diff, so there is no direct evidence the address was fixed in those files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply comprehensive premium UI refresh across ALL public pages including RailwayBookingsPage, PackagesPage, CustomPackagesPage, ContactInquiryPage, AboutPage, TermsPage
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to index.css, HomePage.tsx, FlightBookingsPage.tsx, but RailwayBookingsPage, PackagesPage, CustomPackagesPage, ContactInquiryPage, AboutPage, and TermsPage are not in the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section uses hero-flight-premium-v2.png as the background
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx uses 'hero-premium-jet-tarmac.dim_1920x1080.png' as the hero background, not the specified 'hero-flight-premium-v2.png' required by REQ-57 acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: HotelBookingsPage.tsx was not modified in the diff, but a new hotelApi.ts service was created. The actual page component with hotel search UI, result cards, star ratings, and Book Now CTAs is not evidenced.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-62 requires HotelBookingsPage.tsx to be upgraded, but only hotelApi.ts was added. The page component itself is not shown as modified.

hallucinated_features.description: FlightBookingsPage.tsx uses 'hero-premium-jet-tarmac.dim_1920x1080.png' as its hero background, an image intended only for the homepage hero.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request image specification was for the homepage hero only, but the diff applies it to FlightBookingsPage as well without being requested.
